# Yohan Dunon
**Full-Stack Developer**

I build software by delivering **small, functional, and tested increments continuously**, leveraging **AGILE practices (Scrum/Kanban)** and **feedback loops** to ensure alignment with user needs and technical excellence. Combined with **TDD** and **CI/CD pipelines**, every delivery is **production-ready**, reliable, and aligned with business goals."
